Class AppointmentSlot

java.lang.Object
model.AppointmentSlot
public class AppointmentSlot extends Object
The AppointmentSlot class manages appointment scheduling within the hospital management system. It provides functionalities to add appointments, view personal schedules, manage appointment requests, and update appointment statuses.

  • Method Details

    • getNextAppointmentID

      private String getNextAppointmentID()
      Generates the next available appointment ID based on existing appointment IDs in the file.
      Returns:
      The next appointment ID in the format "APPT{number}".

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(String doctorID)
      Adds a new appointment for the specified doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for whom the appointment is being added.

    • isValidDate

      private boolean isValidDate(String date)
      Validates the date format (DD/MM/YYYY).
      Parameters:
      date - The input date string.
      Returns:
      true if the date format is valid, false otherwise.

    • standardizeTime

      private String standardizeTime(String time)
      Standardizes the time input to a consistent format (HH:MM AM/PM).
      Parameters:
      time - The input time string.
      Returns:
      The standardized time string.

    • isAppointmentConflict

      private boolean isAppointmentConflict(String doctorID, String date, String time)
      Checks if there is an existing appointment for the specified doctor at the given date and time.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor to check for conflicts.
      date - The date of the appointment to check.
      time - The time of the appointment to check.
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict, false otherwise.

    • updateCSV

      private void updateCSV(String appointmentID, String doctorID, String patientID, String date, String time, String status)
      Updates the appointment CSV file with the new appointment details.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      time - The time of the appointment.
      status - The status of the appointment.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(String doctorID)
      Sets the availability for a specific doctor by adding an appointment.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor to set availability for.

    • viewPersonalSchedule

      public void viewPersonalSchedule(String doctorID)
      Views the personal schedule for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose schedule is to be viewed.

    • viewUpcomingAppointment

      public void viewUpcomingAppointment(String doctorID)
      Views upcoming appointments for a specific doctor that are confirmed.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose upcoming appointments are to be viewed.

    • manageAppointmentRequests

      public void manageAppointmentRequests(String doctorID)
      Manages appointment requests for a specific doctor, allowing them to accept or decline appointments.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor managing appointment requests.

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public void updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentID, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of a specific appointment identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set for the appointment.

      Views all appointments stored in the appointment file.

      patientID - The ID of the patient whose scheduled appointments are to be viewed.

      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose pending appointments are to be counted.
      Returns:
      The number of pending appointments for the specified doctor.
